website_summaries.verdict: Keds releases another charming design that keeps the feet insulated during the cold months. Beaming with a high-top form is the Keds Topkick Wool. This chic sneaker has been receiving praises due to its durable makeup. Although it isn’t heavily loaded with tech features, it gets applauses from consumers who are on a hunt for versatile footwear that’s aptly cushioned for whole-day comfort. You can grab this at a reasonable price tag.
pros: Keds Topkick Wool’s covering matched by a fabric shoe lining keep the feet isolated inside, most users declared
The lug pattern on the outsole offers excellent ground contact, according to lots of pleased buyers
The rubber makeup of the sole is grippy enough that it allows the feet to stay stable on slippery grounds, justified by plenty of users
Several followers of this style said its vulcanized sole grants flexibility
The softly padded structure of this high-top sneaker makes it extremely comfortable, described in several reviews
Satisfied purchasers stated this shoe has a perfect fit with enough room for socks
A couple of reviewers who are in for high top shoe that’s not too sporty said the Keds Topkick Wool fits the bill
Lots of wearers contented with the comfort and fit of this high top kick recommended it to their friends and family
Some reviewers were gratified with its well-padded ankle support
This fabric-wrapped high top doesn’t require a break in period, according to over a handful of users
A very affordable and useful sneaker
Some vouched to buy another pair
This well-stitched and precisely assembled sneaker last for a long time, affirmed by a slew of reviewers
cons: One buyer would have loved this sneaker more if it came in more color options

customer_reviews.title: awesome hightop for fall/winter
customer_reviews.text: I had similar ones before and I wore them out so was happy to get a similar pair again. wicked cute, grey felt for Boston and the fall/winter. They are not waterproof but great hightop nevertheless. They fit as a size 9 should and I have a high arch and fat feet!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Likely fake
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these are real Keds. When I compare them to other keds that I own the labels seem a little off. Three stars because they’re still stylish shoes that fit well. But if having the real thing is important to you then you should buy from the actual keds store online.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support, no break in needed.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, do I love my first pair of high tops!! I wanted some ankle support, an ability to adjust the laces, and wool for warmth. Got it all with these.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are comfortable and stylish!! I'll be buying an identical pair again whenever these get worn out in a few years. But they're pretty durable so it might take a while! :)
customer_reviews.author: Marina N.

customer_reviews.title: I feel in love when saw online
customer_reviews.text: I feel in love when saw online, and in love again when I opened the box. It also has a lovely green inside and looks overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Size to large
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews said shoe ran small and narrow. I normally wear a 10 and the 10 was way too big
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: There are bad reviews about these shoes being “too narrow” but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Loveee then so much!! I got a 6.5 and they fit just right! There are bad reviews about these shoes being “too narrow” but I disagree UNLESS you ya e big chubby feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat stiff out of the box, but it didn’t take long to relax. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute with an interesting spin on old-school high top shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow crammed toe!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. Well made. BUT they are def made for very very narrow long feet. I’m usually a 7.5 but ordered a 8! I don’t have very big feet but maybe they are normal/wide. They crammed my toes and the nose was still too long. Disappointed will not be ordering in a diff size unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and cute . I’ve walked all over the city in these without problems. I would purchase them again !
customer_reviews.author: Potterfan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hi top keds.. more colors would be nice woul like them in tan.
customer_reviews.author: shauna foster

product_meta.title: Keds Women's's Topkick Wool Sneaker
product_meta.description: Sneaker bootie upper; ortholite footbed; retro-sport inspired foxing
feature_bullets: Durable rubber outsole for added comfort
